entry.title: good course
entry.content:
一些好的课程

introduction

  • Computer Organization & Systems
    http://web.stanford.edu/class/cs107/index.html
  • 18-447 Introduction to Computer Architecture – Spring 2014
    http://www.ece.cmu.edu/~ece447/s14/doku.php?id=start
  • CS162: Operating Systems and Systems Programming
    http://cs162.eecs.berkeley.edu/
    http://inst.eecs.berkeley.edu/~cs162/archives.html
  • http://www-inst.eecs.berkeley.edu/~cs61a/fa14/

关于函数式编程的

http://www.ccs.neu.edu/home/matthias/HtDP2e/part_prologue.html
用racket来教学的
http://web.stanford.edu/class/cs103/
http://web.stanford.edu/class/cs97si/
http://web.engr.illinois.edu/~jeffe/teaching/algorithms/
https://courses.engr.illinois.edu/cs421/fa2014/lectures/index.html
http://www.scs.stanford.edu/14sp-cs240h/
http://www.seas.upenn.edu/~cis194/lectures.html

Distributed Systems

  • https://courses.engr.illinois.edu/cs425/fa2014/lectures.html
    CS 425 Distributed Systems Univ of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign
  • http://css.csail.mit.edu/6.824/2014

operate system

  • 6.828 Operating Systems MIT
    http://pdos.csail.mit.edu/6.828/2014/

  • CS 140: Operating Systems (Spring 2014)
    http://web.stanford.edu/~ouster/cgi-bin/cs140-spring14/lectures.php
    http://pages.cs.wisc.edu/~remzi/OSTEP/

databases system

CS 186 Introduction to Database Systems

compiler

  • http://web.cecs.pdx.edu/~apt/cs577/
  • go lang
    http://codegangsta.gitbooks.io/building-web-apps-with-go/content/
